SELECT goods_id, goods_name, introduction, img_path, img_name, category, total, target_amount, like_id, alarm_id FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, goods_id, goods_name, introduction, img_path, img_name, category, total, target_amount, like_id, alarm_id FROM ( SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.introduction, gd.img_path, gd.img_name, g.category, NVL(SUM(o.total_amount), 0) AS total, g.target_amount, NVL(like_id, 0) AS like_id, NVL(alarm_id, 0) AS alarm_id FROM goods g LEFT JOIN ORDERs o ON o.goods_id = g.goods_id LEFT JOIN likes l ON l.member_id = #{memberId} AND l.goods_id = g.goods_id JOIN GOODS_DESCRIPTION_IMG gd ON gd.goods_id = g.goods_id JOIN open_alarm oa ON oa.member_id = #{memberId} AND oa.goods_id = g.goods_id WHERE gd.img_position = 1 GROUP BY g.goods_id, g.goods_name, g.introduction, gd.img_path, gd.img_name, g.category, like_id, alarm_id, g.goods_created_at, g.target_amount ORDER BY g.goods_created_at DESC ) )
WHERE rn > (#{pageRequest.pageNum} - 1) * #{pageRequest.amount} AND rn <= #{pageRequest.pageNum} * #{pageRequest.amount}
